casebody.data:
Timothy Burke v. Town of Fairfield et al. (9609)

Daly, O’Connell and Heiman, Js.

Submitted on briefs May 1 decision released May 28, 1991 Andrew R. Sherriff filed a brief for the appellant (plaintiff). Roy H. Ervin and Roy H. Ervin, Jr., filed a brief for the appellees (defendants). Per Curiam.

This case is controlled by our decisions in Manning v. Barenz, 24 Conn. App. 592, 590 A.2d 980 (1991), and Gauthier v. Fairfield, 24 Conn. App. 831, 591 A.2d 827 (1991).

The judgment is affirmed.
